categories.name: Process Improvement
categories.description: Recognition for streamlining processes, increasing efficiency, and reducing manual work

subcategories.name: Automation
subcategories.description: Implementing automated solutions to reduce manual effort
examples: automated 80% of our monthly reporting dashboards

subcategories.name: Optimization
subcategories.description: Improving existing processes to achieve better outcomes
examples: optimized the mobile app reducing load time by 60%

categories.name: Leadership and Team Development
categories.description: Recognition for leadership, team growth, and mentorship

subcategories.name: Team Leadership
subcategories.description: Leading teams to achieve high performance and growth

subcategories.name: Mentorship
subcategories.description: Guiding and supporting team members in their development

categories.name: Technical Expertise
categories.description: Recognition for exceptional technical skills and contributions

subcategories.name: Code Quality
subcategories.description: Delivering high-quality code and improving team quality

categories.name: Business Growth and Impact
categories.description: Recognition for driving business growth and achieving significant impact

subcategories.name: Revenue Growth
subcategories.description: Contributing to increased revenue and business expansion

categories.name: Customer Satisfaction
categories.description: Recognition for delivering exceptional customer support and satisfaction

subcategories.name: Proactive Support
subcategories.description: Providing proactive and high-quality customer support
examples: proactive support and going above and beyond

categories.name: Data-Driven Insights
categories.description: Recognition for delivering data-driven insights and driving business decisions

subcategories.name: Data Analysis
subcategories.description: Providing insightful data analysis to inform business decisions
examples: delivers insights that drive business decisions

categories.name: Collaboration and Partnership
categories.description: Recognition for effective collaboration and partnership with other teams

subcategories.name: Cross-Functional Collaboration
subcategories.description: Working effectively with other teams to achieve common goals
examples: worked seamlessly with sales and product

categories.name: Ramp-Up and Onboarding
categories.description: Recognition for quickly adapting to new roles and delivering results

subcategories.name: Fast Ramp-Up
subcategories.description: Ramping up quickly in a new role and delivering exceptional results

taxonomy.reasoning: This structure fits the data because it captures the distinct types of recognition present in the messages, such as process improvement, leadership, technical expertise, and business growth. The subcategories provide further granularity and help to group similar recognition themes together. The categories and subcategories are derived from the language and content of the messages, rather than relying on generic HR labels.
